lead_paragraph: GARTLIR--Shirley, 96, died peacefully at home on February 15 in Palm Beach Gardens, FL. Born in Queens, formerly of Great Neck, NY. Graduate of Cornell University. She was predeceased by her beloved husband of 72 years, Bernard, and survived by children Lois and Kenneth, daughter-in-law June, eight nieces and nephews and treasured friend Judy Spence. Donations in Shirley's memory may be made to Hospice of Palm Beach County Foundation. 1/3
